alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); New York (Manhattan); Richmond (Staten Is.); Southern Nassau; Southern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued April 18 at 5:00PM EDT until April 19 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...One to locally two feet of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Hudson, Eastern Essex and Eastern Union Counties. In New York, New York (Manhattan), Richmond (Staten Island), Kings (Brooklyn), Southern Queens and Southern Nassau Counties. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 1 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Minor to locally moderate coastal flooding is expected in the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low lying properties including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience minor flooding. A few spots may see moderate flooding with road closures, flooded vehicles, and basement flooding. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. KILL VAN KULL AT BERGEN POINT NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 7.2 FT, MODERATE 8.5 FT, MAJOR 9.6 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 3.0 FT, MAJOR 4.1 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 18/10 AM 5.2/ 5.7 -0.3/ 0.2 -0.3/ 0.2 1 NONE 18/11 PM 7.6/ 8.1 2.1/ 2.6 1.4/ 1.9 2-3 MINOR 19/10 AM 5.4/ 5.9 -0.2/ 0.3 0.2/ 0.8 2 NONE 19/11 PM 5.7/ 6.2 0.2/ 0.7 -0.6/-0.1 2 NONE NEW YORK HARBOR AT THE BATTERY NY MLLW CATEGORIES - info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
